panels.title: CHECKPOINTS RATE

panels.title: BUFFERS WRITTEN RATE

panels.title: AUTOVACUUM WORKERS

panels.title: TOP QUERIES BY RESULT ROWS

panels.title: TOP QUERIES BY DISK READS

panels.title: TOP QUERIES BY CPU USAGE

panels.description: Top statements by disk I/O utilization per database
panels.title: TOP QUERIES BY DISK I/O USAGE

panels.description: The largest tables / materialized views per database
panels.title: TOP BIGGEST TABLES / MATVIEWS

panels.title: TOP BIGGEST INDEXES

panels.description: The biggest unused indexes per database
panels.title: TOP UNUSED INDEXES

panels.description: The most bloated tables / materialized views per database

targets.expr: max by (database, relname) (sql_pg_stat_user_tables_bloated{job=~"[[job_name]]", host=~"[[instance]]:[0-9]+", database=~"[[database]]", col="wasted_bytes"})
max by (database, relname) (sql_pg_stat_user_tables_bloated{job=~"[[job_name]]", host=~"[[instance]]:[0-9]+", database=~"[[database]]", col="wasted_ratio"})

panels.title: TOP BLOATED TABLES

panels.description: The most bloated indexes per database

targets.expr: max by (database, index) (sql_pg_stat_user_indexes_bloated{job=~"[[job_name]]", host=~"[[instance]]:[0-9]+", database=~"[[database]]", col="wasted_bytes"})
max by (database, index) (sql_pg_stat_user_indexes_bloated{job=~"[[job_name]]", host=~"[[instance]]:[0-9]+", database=~"[[database]]", col="wasted_ratio"})

panels.title: TOP BLOATED INDEXES

panels.description: Top frequently used functions

targets.expr: max by (datname, funcname) (sql_pg_stat_user_functions{job=~"[[job_name]]", host=~"[[instance]]:[0-9]+", datname=~"[[database]]", col="calls"})
max by (datname, funcname) (sql_pg_stat_user_functions{job=~"[[job_name]]", host=~"[[instance]]:[0-9]+", datname=~"[[database]]", col="total_time"})

panels.title: TOP FREQUENT FUNCTIONS
